work_experience.description: Worked on a large scale financial system with high availability and resilience. Been responsible for designing and implementing scalable and maintainable architectures.

projects.name: SmartGardener
projects.description: A fullstack web application for managing your plants. Implemented with React.js and Node.js. Features include plant database, watering reminders, and plant care tips. Deployed on Heroku. Offers rich UI/UX experience. Also available via API.

projects.name: CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: Implemented complete CI/CD pipeline for a web application.

projects.name: HomeFinApp
projects.description: A web application for managing personal finances. Features include budget tracking, expense categorization, financial reports, analyzing receipts, and setting financial goals. WIP. For now functional backend, work extesively on beautiful frontend.

profile.about_me: Experienced Fullstack Developer with a background in Computer Science. Skilled in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Node.js, CI/CD, npm, yarn, Webpack, and Babel. Strong problem-solving and communication skills. Passionate about developing modern financial systems with high availability and resilience.
